None.Name: Tainted
None.Description: Confuses the target enemy unit which will no longer be able to distinguish between friend and foe for 15 seconds. It will therefor start attacking whatever entity is nearby no matter if it is friendly or hostile. It may also tranfer its confusion to other surrounding hostile or friendly units within a 15m radius, up to total 15 targets may be affected. Reusable every 45 seconds.
